Sentece: Compared with the normal cats, the mean plasma elimination half-life of PTU was significantly (P less than 0.001) shorter in the hyperthyroid cats (77.5 +/- 5.8 minutes compared with 125.5 +/- 3.7 minutes) and the total body clearance of PTU was significantly (P less than 0.05) more rapid in the cats with hyperthyroidism (5.1 +/- 0.8 ml kg-1 min-1 compared with 2.7 +/- 0.2 ml kg-1 min-1).
